answers.answer: I have GD and met with a nutritionist and she basically broke it down like this...15grams of carbohydrates are considered 1 serving of carbohydrates so for breakfast/lunch/dinner I'm able to have 3-4 servings of carbs and for my 3 snacks in between I can have 2 servings of carbs. Along with those meals and snacks i make sure I have something with protein in it cheeses,eggs, nuts, chicken etc.

question: I just found out i have gestational diabetes and i have no idea what to eat. Advice?
title: what to eat with GD??
